title: No One Believed Me. If You Say You Believe Me Now, It’s Too Late - Novel Updates
genre: Drama   Psychological   Romance   School Life   Tragedy
tags: Adapted to Manga   Beautiful Female Lead   Betrayal   Brother Complex   Cold Love Interests   Early Romance   Emotionally Weak Protagonist   Handsome Male Lead   Hated Protagonist   Male Protagonist   Modern Day   Multiple POV   Past Trauma
author: Nora Usagi (Usako)   Stray Rabbit (Rabbit)   野良うさぎ(うさこ)
description:
Nyanta and Pomeko – Even if you say you believe me now, it’s too late.

No one believed in me.

It’s too late to say I believe you now.

My childhood friend, my step-sister and the girl with glasses are all trying to get involved with me now.

I don’t care anymore. Just leave me alone.

This is a love story of a man who doesn’t believe in anyone.>
